full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RTZOD PA'I DUS KYING THA MA'I RANG CAG SEMS CAN RNAMS LA, MI DANG MI MIN RNAMS KYI GNOD PA CHAR LTAR 'BAB PA'I DUS 'DI LA RANG GZHAN KUN LA PHAN PA DANG, KHYAD PAR DUS RUS SHIN TU MTHO SHING PHUN SUM TSOGS PA DAD PA DANG DAM TSIG GTZANG MA RNAM SPYOD YANGS PA THU SHI YI GUNG KHUN TE MING 'UR GI @004B TSE RIN CHEN RDO RJE DON DU, SH'AKYA DGE SLONG DZNY'A NA MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,)
